ComicInfo.Title: Dress For Success; Restaurant Wars; Mona Lucy
ComicInfo.Summary: Peppermint Patty like you've never seen her before... in a dress! What could make the world's most notorious tomboy get all gussied up in her most girly duds? The answers - and the best durn goop you've ever tasted - are in this new issue of Peanuts, along with your standard dose of classic Schulz Sunday strips!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-12 16:42:55. [CVDB388579]

ComicInfo.Colorist: Alexis E. Fajardo, Art Roche, Iain R. Morris, Justin Thompson, Lisa Moore, Nina Taylor Kester
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Charles M. Schulz, Emily Chang, Iain R. Morris, Paige Braddock, Vicki Scott
ComicInfo.Editor: Alex Galer, Matt Gagnon, Shannon Watters
ComicInfo.Characters: Charlie Brown, Marcie, Peppermint Patty, Snoopy
